description: This file defines a React-like component using Qwik framework, rendering a hero section with an image, heading, and buttons, including a confetti animation triggered on button click.

methods.name: loadConfetti
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the external confetti script and resolves with the confetti function.

methods.name: shoot
methods.description: Triggers two confetti bursts with specified defaults to create a celebration effect.
